name: Kousso brayera
Relationship: Compare: MELILOTUS - Kamala - An efficient remedy for tape-worm in 30-60 minims of tincture taken in cinnamon water.
details: A VERMIFUGE - Nausea and vomiting, vertigo, precordial anxiety slowing and irregular pulse, sub delirium and collapse. Rapid and extreme prostration. To expel tape-worm.
dosage: 1/2 oz. Mix with warm water and let stand 15 minutes; stir well and administer. May be preceded by a little lemon juice. (Merrell).
